bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Definitions of Terms for Radio Wave Propagation
IEEE Standard Definitions of Terms for Radio Wave Propagation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms and definitions used in the context of electromagnetic wave propagation relating to the fields of telecommunications, remote sensing, radio astronomy, optical waves, plasma waves, the ionosphere, the magnetosphere, and magnetohydrodynamic, acoustic, and electrostatic waves are supplied.

Terms and definitions used in the context of electromagnetic wave propagation relating to the fields of telecommunications, remote sensing, radio astronomy, optical waves, plasma waves, the ionosphere, the magnetosphere, and magnetohydrodynamic, acoustic, and electrostatic waves are supplied.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
